content.task: Conduct architectural analysis of the Stellar connector codebase to identify structural issues including orphaned modules, incomplete implementations, and duplicate functionality. Analyze the 51 Python files (~26,446 lines) and provide systematic recommendations for code consolidation and architectural improvements.
content.context:
Architectural Code Review Request:
- Scope: 51 Python files in stellar connector (26,446 total lines)
- Issues found so far: 2 NotImplementedError cases, multiple stub implementations
- Files with stubs: stellar_health_monitor.py:117, stellar_vault_integration.py:126
- Goal: Identify architectural debt, duplicate patterns, and consolidation opportunities
- Compliance: Must maintain production-ready standards and never skip failing tests
- Focus areas: Module dependencies, interface consistency, design pattern usage
